専門家3行コメント.@ja: 報告された新規陽性者数の7日間平均は10週間ぶりに減少した。ただし、今週の新規陽性者数は、年末年始中の検査数の減少等の影響を受けた数値となっているため、多数の感染者が潜在していることも考えられる。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The 7-day moving average of new positive cases as counted under the new reporting system has decreased for the first time in 10 weeks. However, since this week’s number of new positive cases has been affected by factors such as fewer people being tested over the year-end and new year period, it is possible that many cases remain undetected.

専門家3行コメント.@ja: 入院患者数は、年末年始中も4,000人を上回り、増加傾向が続いている。医療機関では、感染拡大により、就業制限を受ける医療従事者等が増加している。体制確保が困難な中、一般の救急受診等の対応もあり、厳しい状況が続いている。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The upward trend in hospitalized patients continues, with the number remaining over 4,000 during the year-end and new year period. The spread of infection is preventing a growing number of healthcare workers and others from reporting to work due to COVID-19 related work restrictions. With medical institutions having difficulty securing ample personnel and the need to also provide care to non-COVID emergency patients, the situation continues to be severe.

display.@ja: 医療体制がひっ迫している
display.@en: The health care delivery system is under strain.
